de.ityx.mediatrix.api.factories.decorators

Class DefaultCustomEditorContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ityx.mediatrix.api.factories.decorators.DefaultCustomEditorContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEditor, IEditorContainer, IPopupExtender, KeyListener, MouseListener, EventListener

    public class DefaultCustomEditorContainer
extends Object
implements IEditorContainer, MouseListener, KeyListener
    Is used to create the custom editors to integrate them into the system. The class contains the default common functionalities like the dictionary.
    How to use:
    The new editor must extend the class. The name must be "de.ityx.custom.editor.CustomEditor". The application create the editor and integrate them into the application.

        Description copied from interface: IEditorContainer
        Inserts an text from the position.
        Specified by:
        insert in interface IEditorContainer
        caret - the caret position
        plainText - true, if a text is in plain format
